com.gams.algorithms

Class BaseAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gams.GamsJNI
      • com.gams.algorithms.BaseAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlgorithmInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebuggerAlgorithm, MessageProfiling

    public abstract class BaseAlgorithm
extends GamsJNI
implements AlgorithmInterface
    Base class that should be extended when creating a Java algorithm for usage in the GAMS controller

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(BaseController controller)
        Initialize the platform with controller variables. Use this method to synchronize user-defined algorithms with the controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - controller which will be using the algorithm

        Parameters:
